text: Can you help me query the meeting details for the Marketing Campaign Planning on March 22nd 2023 from 9am to 11am held in Marketing Department, with attendees Karen Zhang, Mark Brown, and Timothy Lee?

output.name: GetUserToken
output.desc_for_search: get user tokenGet the user token.

output.name: QueryMeeting
output.description: This API allows users to query a reservation for a meeting.Function：Query infomation for a meeting.Exception Handling：1. If the Query is successful, return a meeting infomation with json.2. If the Query fails, return a error message.

meeting_topic.description: The title of the meeting, no more than 50 characters.

start_time.description: The start time of the meeting, in the pattern of %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S

end_time.description: The end time of the meeting, in the pattern of %Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S

location.description: The location where the meeting to be held, no more than 100 characters.

attendees.description: The attendees of the meeting, including names, positions and other information.

text: I found one. I need your username and password to generate the token for authenticate. What's your username and password?
My username is testuser and password is testpass.
We have successfully authenticated. Now I will check the meeting reservation.

The meeting information is as follows: Meeting Topic: Marketing Campaign Planning Start Time: 2023-03-22 09:00:00 End Time: 2023-03-22 11:00:00 Location: Marketing Department Attendees: Karen Zhang, Mark Brown, Timothy Lee
